title: Smoked salmon, cannellini bean and rosemary chowder
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons finely diced onion', '2 (400g) tins cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '1 large potato, boiled and mashed (or leftover mash)', '100g smoked salmon, diced', '1 whole sprig of rosemary', '500ml vegetable stock', 'salt and white pepper, to taste']
